answerText: Samuel Taylor Coleridge [10] That poem was published in this collaboration with William Wordsworth.
heading: ACF Winter |2009 | Harvard | 4 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: In one of his best known works, he writethat "a million million slimy things lived on/ and so did I." For 10 points each:  [10] Identify this poet of "The Rime of the Ancient Mariner."
